unnormalised: Mhojem Desi Familichi Natak: Divorce Edition (LOL)
normalised: Mhojem Desi Kutumbachem Natak: Ghorfutti Edition (L-O-L)
text: Mhojem Desi Familichi Natak: Divorce Edition (LOL)

unnormalised: Bore zanaka, to yaar, bandh tumchi kamar, kiteak mhonnlear Auntiji vollta chaa ek vishyacher konakuch favona, punn sogllezhanch ek torechen sombondh asta: kutumbacho kaido, khas korun ghoddfoddi. Aata, tumi mhaka saree-nt rubonn ravtana kalpitana adhi, shaant ravat. Hem *mhujem* natak nhoi. Punn hanvem purosh korttache natak dekhleat ek Bollywood filma-k sori korun yeta. Ani mhojem bhavachem, tea ghoddfoddi vokilkaran korttache lokan sarke Karan Johar dhongache - natki, shaileeche, ani ekhdem potte uzbavtat.

Ani mhojem bhavachem, tea ghoddfoddi vokilkaran korttache lokan sarke Karan Johar dhongache - natki, shaileeche, ani ekhdem potte uzbavtat.
text: Bore zanaka, to yaar, bandh tumchi kamar, kiteak mhonnlear Auntiji vollta chaa ek vishyacher konakuch favona, punn sogllezhanch ek torechen sombondh asta: kutumbacho kaido, khas korun ghoddfoddi. Aata, tumi mhaka saree-nt rubonn ravtana kalpitana adhi, shaant ravat. Hem *mhujem* natak nhoi. Punn hanvem purosh korttache natak dekhleat ek Bollywood filma-k sori korun yeta. Ani mhojem bhavachem, tea ghoddfoddi vokilkaran korttache lokan sarke Karan Johar dhongache - natki, shaileeche, ani ekhdem potte uzbavtat.

unnormalised: Pehle mhuntlear, bhayanak dhara 498A. Mhuntlear, baaylecho sooḍ. Bharotantlo dor ek ghorkar IPC chya hea dharek bhito. Hacher vostuchik vindaloo peksha jast tikhat masaalo laavun case file kortat ani, sach mhuntlear, kitek pavtim tem yogya asta. Dusre pavtim, mhuntlear, konachi tori aai Zee TV khub paanun aple baaichea dokyat vichar bhorta. Mhozo shejari Suresh, to aapli biwi he file karat mhunn bhieun dhamak dhameka ghamta. Tannem tika ek hireachi nathnni (Rs. 50,000 chi!) dili ani Banarasaklean Import keli saree ghetli. Punn, dista tika Switzerlandak vacationak vochpak zai. #IndianWifeGoals.
normalised: Poilo vishay: bhayanak dhara chyar shem ekaunnau A. A-k-a, bailacho sooḍ. Bharotantle dor ek ghovak I-P-C chea hea dharyachi bhee dista. Hi sadharan vindaloo peksa chodd masale ghalun dakholl korta, ani satyachi gozal mhunnttlear, kednaim-kednaim ti nyayak asun yetta. Dusrea vellar, borem, konnachichi maa aplea bahuchea mathant Zee T-V zaitich polloilea uprant vichar ghalea mhunnttlear bore. Mhozo xezari Suresh, to aple biwi-n hi dakholl kortolea dhokyen dhusdhusat asa. Tannem tika hirache nakulfulle dile (rupea ponchas hazarache!) ani tinnem Banarasantle import kelolee saadee vikti ghetli. Punn, dista ti Switzerland-ak sutti magta. hash Bharoti Bailanche Dhyeya.
text: Pehle mhuntlear, bhayanak dhara 498A. Mhuntlear, baaylecho sooḍ. Bharotantlo dor ek ghorkar IPC chya hea dharek bhito. Hacher vostuchik vindaloo peksha jast tikhat masaalo laavun case file kortat ani, sach mhuntlear, kitek pavtim tem yogya asta. Dusre pavtim, mhuntlear, konachi tori aai Zee TV khub paanun aple baaichea dokyat vichar bhorta. Mhozo shejari Suresh, to aapli biwi he file karat mhunn bhieun dhamak dhameka ghamta. Tannem tika ek hireachi nathnni (Rs. 50,000 chi!) dili ani Banarasaklean Import keli saree ghetli. Punn, dista tika Switzerlandak vacationak vochpak zai. #IndianWifeGoals.

unnormalised: Ani magir tumkam alimony-chi vaṭāghaṭi melltta. Oh, kitli dhuvāṇ! Tem Shark Tank-ache ekā-ekā episode-achi kadi-na-somponk zai asleli bhāg bhāsta, punn tantū dukān ani komī kīmat astā. Mākā ek pavtī ek husband zhogḍatalo dīskholo, ki tankā itlī paisā diunk zāīna kāran tanchi bāīlan sārī paisā "fōkattache vastu" bhārtale, jiāri tache aai-ache medical-achi paisā. Sir, tum seriously? Ani, konnem reasonable kitlī amount āssā aiz kāl? Sāmbhallollē kī konnem āple husband-ache salary-chi 20% jīvīt-bhar mellolī. Jīvīt!
normalised: Mhunn'llear tumkam maintenance babtend zata. Oh, kitli dhaandalli! Tech Shark Tank-chem kednach somponam ashem episode, punn dukham ani komi mulyaankan zait. Hanv ek pavtt ek zonntolok aapnnim itlem diunchem poddona mhunn vakhaan korunk aikolem, kiteak tachi baail tannanche soglle poixe "kaarann nastanchim vostu," zoxe tannchem ayyichem vaizki kharchancher kharch korta. Sir, khorench? Toxench, kitli aaz-kaal somadhan jaait? Konnank tannchea ghorche dhoniachem pongda vis takke jivitbhor mellto mhunn aikolem. Jivitbhor!
text: Ani magir tumkam alimony-chi vaṭāghaṭi melltta. Oh, kitli dhuvāṇ! Tem Shark Tank-ache ekā-ekā episode-achi kadi-na-somponk zai asleli bhāg bhāsta, punn tantū dukān ani komī kīmat astā. Mākā ek pavtī ek husband zhogḍatalo dīskholo, ki tankā itlī paisā diunk zāīna kāran tanchi bāīlan sārī paisā "fōkattache vastu" bhārtale, jiāri tache aai-ache medical-achi paisā. Sir, tum seriously? Ani, konnem reasonable kitlī amount āssā aiz kāl? Sāmbhallollē kī konnem āple husband-ache salary-chi 20% jīvīt-bhar mellolī. Jīvīt!

unnormalised: bāḷācē sanrakṣaṇācē zhuzhāro? kāḷiz kacākacī karatā. kalpāna kara dōg jāṇāncī, jē ēkamekastīlā ādhar dīvnk saccānnā nāśile, ātā chōṭyā rōhānavēḷār dānta āṇi nakhāṇī zhuzatā. nyāyādhīś mhaṇajē mulbhūtpanṇē sōlōman, kōṇāk bāḷa melltā hē ōḷakhnk prayatna karatā, vāṇṭūk kornk sāṅgīnk nāśaśīlē. tarī astanā, kōnītaryā kājaḷyāñcē vixayī aikalyā uparānt, tō taklīfa dîta tāṇī taṇē sūcīkēlā tarī mhakāṇī dōśa dīnk nā. rōhānacī krīkēt kōcīṅ (mahinyāk 15,000 rupayē) āṇi śāḷēcī fīs dhōkyān assāt, lōkāṇō! hē kaslench nā śūṅkaṇā.
normalised: bhurgem konnacho tabent ravchem hachi zhogddim? kalliz toddttat. kalpna korat dog zann, jeknaka ekamekachya hathank door ravonk zaina aslem, atam lhan Rohan khatir dantank dant laavun zhogddtat. judge mhonnlear Solomon, konnak bhurgo mellttolo tem sodun kaddpacho yotn korta, fakt taka don tukdde korpachi baat soddun. punn kaim kes aiklea uprant, taka ashich suchovna kelear hanv taka dosh dina. Rohanachi cricket coaching (rupay ponra hazar dor mhoinyaak) ani school fees sanktant asat, lokano! hem mazak nhoi.
text: bāḷācē sanrakṣaṇācē zhuzhāro? kāḷiz kacākacī karatā. kalpāna kara dōg jāṇāncī, jē ēkamekastīlā ādhar dīvnk saccānnā nāśile, ātā chōṭyā rōhānavēḷār dānta āṇi nakhāṇī zhuzatā. nyāyādhīś mhaṇajē mulbhūtpanṇē sōlōman, kōṇāk bāḷa melltā hē ōḷakhnk prayatna karatā, vāṇṭūk kornk sāṅgīnk nāśaśīlē. tarī astanā, kōnītaryā kājaḷyāñcē vixayī aikalyā uparānt, tō taklīfa dîta tāṇī taṇē sūcīkēlā tarī mhakāṇī dōśa dīnk nā. rōhānacī krīkēt kōcīṅ (mahinyāk 15,000 rupayē) āṇi śāḷēcī fīs dhōkyān assāt, lōkāṇō! hē kaslench nā śūṅkaṇā.

unnormalised: Ani *khandan* (vistarit kutumb) visrunk naka. Soglleankuy tanchi tanchi ray asta, konnuch ulo divonk lazonaka. "Beta, tumi vostu sudharunk yatn korunk zai," te mhuntat, ani ekach velar tumchea ghorkarponnachya prosnancher colonyantlea dor Sharmaji ani Vermajink gossiping kortat. Bharotant divorce azunuy "log kya kahenge?" situation asa, 2024ntuy! Soglleankuch tumi fuktich hasunk ani sosunk zai mhunn dista, tumcho ghorkar tumcho brush toilet saf korpak vaparta zalearuy. Na, mhoje nodrent na.
normalised: आनी *खंडान* (व्हड कुटुंब) विसरचे न्हय. सगळ्यांक मत आसा, कोणाकच तें वांटून घेवपाक लाज ना. "बेटा, तुमी सगळे सोडोवंक प्रयत्न कर," ते म्हणटात, आनी एकाच वेळार तुमच्या लग्नाच्या प्रस्नां विशीं कॉलनींतल्या सगळ्या शर्माजी आनी वर्माजी कडेन गुपीत उलयतात. भारतांत घटस्फोट म्हळ्यार अजून "लोक कितें म्हणटले?" अशी परिस्थिती आसा, दोन हजार चोवीस वर्सांनी लेगीत! सगळ्यांक दिसता तुमी फकत हांसून सगळें सोंसून घेवचें, जरी तुमचो घोव/बाय तुमचें टूथब्रश टॉयलेट साफ करपाक वापरता आसत तरी. न्हय, म्हजे नदरेक न्हय.
text: Ani *khandan* (vistarit kutumb) visrunk naka. Soglleankuy tanchi tanchi ray asta, konnuch ulo divonk lazonaka. "Beta, tumi vostu sudharunk yatn korunk zai," te mhuntat, ani ekach velar tumchea ghorkarponnachya prosnancher colonyantlea dor Sharmaji ani Vermajink gossiping kortat. Bharotant divorce azunuy "log kya kahenge?" situation asa, 2024ntuy! Soglleankuch tumi fuktich hasunk ani sosunk zai mhunn dista, tumcho ghorkar tumcho brush toilet saf korpak vaparta zalearuy. Na, mhoje nodrent na.

unnormalised: सच सांगता, ही सगळी प्रक्रिया सोमाराच्या सकाळी सरकारी कार्यालया परस लेडगी आसा. न्यायाधीशा कडेन गजाली करपा परस चड वेळ तुमी कोर्टाच्या वेटिंग रुमांत बसून काडटले. श्रीमती अय्यर विरुद्ध श्री अय्यर हांचो केस 2018 सावन चलत आसा! तुमकां तुमच्या घरांतल्या लोका परस कोर्टाच्या कर्मचाऱ्यांक चड वळख जाता! कदाचित तोच मुद्दा आसतलो.
normalised: सच सांगचे म्हणल्यार, ही सगळी प्रक्रिया सोमवार सकाळचे सरकारी कार्यालया इतकी हळू आसा. न्यायाधीशा कडेन गजाली करचे परस कोर्टाच्या वेटिंग रुमांत चड वेळ तुमचो वतलो. मिसेस अय्यर विरुद्ध मिस्टर अय्यर हांचो केस दोन हजार अठरा सावन चालू आसा! निमाणें तुमकां तुमच्या घरांतल्या लोकांपरस कोर्टांतले कर्मचारी चड वळखताले जातात! कदाचित तोच मुद्दा आसतलो.
text: सच सांगता, ही सगळी प्रक्रिया सोमाराच्या सकाळी सरकारी कार्यालया परस लेडगी आसा. न्यायाधीशा कडेन गजाली करपा परस चड वेळ तुमी कोर्टाच्या वेटिंग रुमांत बसून काडटले. श्रीमती अय्यर विरुद्ध श्री अय्यर हांचो केस 2018 सावन चलत आसा! तुमकां तुमच्या घरांतल्या लोका परस कोर्टाच्या कर्मचाऱ्यांक चड वळख जाता! कदाचित तोच मुद्दा आसतलो.

unnormalised: Khoi, India-ntlem kutumb nem mhonnllear ekdom wild ride. Bhawnanchem, kagadpatranchem ani magneastli fukott bud’dhi divpi auntinchem rollercoaster. Tumi divorce gheunche vixim chintat zalear, ek boro lawyer (ani ek therapistui zait). Ani devakhatir, pre-nup kara! Tem laginachea pisotponnache virudh ek insurance policy bhaxen. Tum mhojem upkar manntolim. Atam, tumi mhaka maaf korat, mhaka mhojea xezareanchem orddop aikuta. Live-action kutumb nem drama-khatir vell! *popcorn ghetto*
